content: Seems like syntax highlighting breaks when there's whitespace in a code (surrounded by quotation marks). I reckon this is not an intended behavior?
You're right, that breaks syntax highlighting pretty badly it looks like. I've logged it as an issue here: https://github.com/standardhealth/vscode-language-fsh/issues/8. Thanks for reporting!
@Nick Freiter Thanks! I'm never sure whether something is a bug or a feature :P
@Nick Freiter seems like this bug went unnoticed?

The bug is in our backlog to address, but we've been focusing pretty hard on some other areas of SUSHI, and haven't had a chance to fix this yet. But this is an important issue, and one we do need to address, so I've moved it up our backlog so that we will get this fixed soon. Thanks for the reminder, and sorry about the delay in fixing it.
@Halina Labikova , version 1.0.6 of the FSH extension for VS Code has been released. It should fix this bug, thanks for your patience!
